name: NO PROBLEM
tag_list: pay-per-call, pay-per-action, onlinepay-per-call, local-search, local-search-monetization, pay-per-call-platforms, online-directory-publishing, yellow-pages-industry, advertising, mobile, local, performance-advertising, pay-per-action-phone-calls
overview:
NO PROBLEM is an Israeli-based high-tech Software company and a Local directory publisher offering a best-in-class pay-per-call platform which helps online directories easily evolve to pay-per-per action.

NO PROBLEM has been a player in the Israeli directory publishing space since 2006 as a 100% pay-per-call directory publisher, quickly evolving from a technology beta-site into a substantial revenue generator. Based on their success, NO PROBLEM began, in the second quarter of 2010, to aggressively market its pay-per-call solution to directory publishers worldwide who are evolving to pay-per-action business models.

NO PROBLEM currently has operations in Israel, China, Eastern Europe and South America and several other markets and is backed by Jerusalem Capital and a group of â€œsuper-angelsâ€ well-steeped in the directory service business.

NO PROBLEM â€œLocal Search Monetization Engineâ€ - Helping directories easily evolve to pay-per-action. NO PROBLEM
